Effect: Your attacks leave a splatter of vivid colors on impact. They are difficult to remove.
You may occupy the same space as an ally, as if both of you were non-solid.
When connection between PET, Navi, and/or NetOp are separated, the Navi may keep one BattleChip to use.
Spend a couple seconds to create a small sandwich, dessert, snack, or some other unspecified finger food in your hand.
Can turn a non-multihit Shot chip into a 1x(X+1) multihit chip. X = chip damage (min 2).
When using a Thrown chip, roll Strength to throw at Far. A partial success will make the chip have the Slow tag.
Sacrifice -1 damage of a Blade/Impact chip to make defenses against it upshifted.
Downloading chips from enemies may instead use the tables below for random chips. (May use MysteryData tables instead)
When an enemy attempts to parry your attacks, you can take half their damage (rounded up) to ignore it, dealing full damage to them.
Once per jack-in, on failing a social roll, can make a joke/pun for a full success. Result depends on GM reaction and ruling.
Sacrifice 1 unused chip to list 6 chips you own not currently in your Folder. Roll a 1d6 to select one; it activates, even if circumstances forbid it.
When desired, you may upshift your next defense roll. If you take damage, add that amount of dice to your next rolled attack.
Before an attack roll, you may add +3 dice. Reduce the used skill by 1 after the attack.
Sacrifice 1 unused chip to add +1 damage to another damaging chip you can use. For multi-hit chips, adds another hit to it instead.
When an ally downshifts your roll, you may spend 1 Affinity to summon their element around you.
For any damaging chip, reduce your HP by 4-X (X = chip damage) to guarantee the secondary effect on a single target.
When enemies are not engaged with you or your allies, you can focus more on moving. Speed rolls gain a free extra three dice.
Your Navi has an additional element. Roll one less die to summon/manipulate it. Standard Element selection rules apply.
You can spend 1 skill point to gain a Navi power of the relevant skill. Can only hold one extra gained power at a time.
Before jack-in, pick a specific type of terrain, with GM discretion. While you are Close to this terrain, all of your rolls are downshifted.
On jack-in, pick one skill from Soul. You may roll Speed as a replacement for rolls using that skill, with one less die.
4 times per jack-in, summon a goon Near you that uses a starter BattleChip of your choice.
Summoned allies/objects/Viruses spawn with a free Guard, protecting against one attack.
When you take damage, you are given a Guard that absorbs a single hit.
All healing from any source is halved (except for Regenerate), rounded down. Regenerate lasts for 3 rolls/chips instead of 5.
All rolled attacks have -1 die.
BattleChips must be used alphabetically, from A to Z.
On chip use, take 1 damage. Takes place before chip effects. Not capable of deleting.
Maximum Folder size reduced by 2. Cannot be used with Custom+3.
Navi has trouble landing hits. All rolled attacks deal -1 damage. All chips used gain the Awkward tag as you slide around.
Every time you take damage, you take 1 extra point of damage.
Your element is draining to you. Being Close to it upshifts all of your rolls. Taking damage will make it leak out.
Navi has trouble perceiving the area. Can only attack at Close, no matter what. Further-ranged chips and powers must be used in Close range.
Your Naviâ€™s chassis is fragile. All defense rolls are upshifted. Guard effects fizzle away on you.
Powers become painful. When using a Roll power, roll twice and take the lowest value. For Cost powers, this applies to your next roll.
No Bond Powers. All positive effects from allied chips, NCPs, elements, or powers fail on you.
On rolling partial success/failure or using a chip, a medium Hazard spawns atop you, consuming any of your element present. Only affects you.
Max. HP is 1, and HP cannot go above 1, no matter what. Low HP benefits do not activate.
You can feel yourself slipping away. Whenever you roll, spend a skill point in the rolled skill. Whenever you use a chip, sacrifice another chip.
Sense attacks are Piercing and ignore Guards.
Immunity to stun or interrupting effects. Attacks always go off.
On taking damage, you may immediately counterattack a target.
Can roll Info to dodge an attack you've seen. On dodging a rolled attack, enemy gets 1 skill reduction in that skill until virus is deleted.
Learn one memory the target has per hit.
Briefly project an illusion of anything you've seen/heard in Near range.
Make a free attack to immediately interrupt a Near enemy's attack.
When performing an opening attack, or taking an opponent by surprise, roll twice and take the better result.
Can bypass structures/hazards unharmed, even inexplicably.
Next ranged attack freezes enemy in place until they break free.
Enemies hit with attacks are briefly stunned and drug into Close.
Has a Guard that ignores all <2 damage. Pops on 2+ damage.
If enemy moves away a range band, immediately make a downshifted attack.
When a Near ally attacks or defends in melee, you may immediately move in Close next to them. Your next attack is downshifted.
Steal someone else's appearance, replacing one stat with theirs.
Emit your element outwards, healing 1 HP per hit to Near allies.
When allies are Close to your element, downshift their rolls.
Upgrade an ally's targeting. They can attack one more range band.
Target an enemy, downshifting X+1 allied rolls against them. X = hits.
Until you lose HP, all Near to you upshift or downshift a chosen skill.
Spray at a Close target. They lose or gain 2 dice on their next roll.
Put a Guard on an ally. Next time they defend, add your Stamina to their roll.
Trap a Near surface; creating a 2 damage freezing blast when touched.
Place a hidden normal hazard on a Near entrance.
Damaged foes have last-used NCPs/Powers disabled for 3 rolls.
Roll to attack a Near target. Everything Close to the target is also hit. Spreads your element all over target and everything Close on impact.
Make a ranged attack on a grounded Near target.
Downshift Charm rolls for Close allies.
If you fall a range band, destroy any structure/object you land on.
When a structure breaks, spawn a normal hazard of your element.
